mil.nga.giat.geowave.accumulo.query

Class AccumuloQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.accumulo.query.AccumuloQuery
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractAccumuloRowQuery, AccumuloFilteredIndexQuery

    public abstract class AccumuloQuery
extends Object
    This class is used internally to perform query operations against an Accumulo data store. The query is defined by the set of parameters passed into the constructor.
